    sub_sum_list.append(sub_sum_list[-1] + weights[i])

from sys import stdin

n = int(stdin.readline())
w = [int(x) for x in stdin.readline().split()]

# calculate the sum of all weights
sum_w = sum(w)

# calculate the sum of the weights for each possible group
# (1 <= T < N)
sum_w_1 = 0
sum_w_2 = [0] * n
for i in range(n):
    sum_w_1 += w[i]
    sum_w_2[i] = sum_w - sum_w_1

# find the minimum difference
min_diff = abs(sum_w_1 - sum_w_2[0])
for i in range(1, n):
    if abs(sum_w_1 - sum_w_2[i]) < min_diff:
        min_diff = abs(sum_w_1 - sum_w_2[i])

print(min_diff)
